CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: P3 exhibited the highest PCE value of 5.61% among all polymers , including P1 and P7 , which was attributed to the broad absorption and increased V OC due to the deeper HOMO energy level.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3 |
| all polymers |
| P1 |
| P7 |

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "P3", "all polymers", "P1", and "P7". These entities are mentioned as materials in the context of the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3 |
| P1 |
| P7 |

After removing the entity "all polymers" which does not clearly refer to a specific material name, the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "P3", "P1", and "P7". These entities are mentioned as materials in the context of the paragraph.
